full_text:
100 Days of Japanese starts tomorrow!

So sudden üòÜ

Goals:
- Read signage
- Basic tourist conversation
- Watch anime üòá

Please gimme anime recs, especially if suited for a beginner :D

0/100 Days of Japanese

Began with a Cure Dolly video explaining 'ga' and 'da' in simple sentences; powerful.

Then Duolingo for nouns.

Watched Spirited Away. In Japanese. AMAZING production. Highlight of the day for sure. Spoiled myself with merch.

Such a fantastic start!

1/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/9ESdmu3prf

Watched a Dolly video and did Duolingo while waiting for my flight.

That was yesterday xD

Maybe I can get ahold of a list of tech words ü§£ tech & food will have me set for a WHILE

OH!! I wonder what 'As a developer...' is in Japanese ü§£

Bye UK ‚ù§Ô∏è

2/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/qEfMn9ySMD

Had time for one challenge on Duolingo before I crashed. Long day with the flight and braai in the evening.

3/100 Days of Japanese

Wedding prep is hectic and I'm not even involved in the wedding planning ü§£

Not my wedding.

Did a few more challenges. Dying to watch more videos tbh, but it'll have to wait until family hasn't keeping me occupied.

4/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/6FpqoRzGDj

Watched a video on mistakes a dude made learning Japanese; I should basically learn things in context pronto.

Also Duolingo.

Wedding's over; back to WordPress for a small client project this week. ^^

5/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/mla5p0JigJ

Moved to hiragana.

So sleepy rn my eyes are closing xD

6/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/LyolqV14vf

I wonder how much damage I can do in 4 days üíÄ

Learning hiragana is actually fun. I look forward to writing it!

7/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/ECPxg2FLDl

Not bad for two days. 

How long do you think it'll take me to learn just this alphabet?

8/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/8Ab8xySikF

Got caught up with the hiragana and turning Unit 1 into Legendary so now I've got to rush to stream in 15 mins üòÜ

MIZU TO SUSHI KUDASAIIIII~~
üíßüç£üôèüèΩ

9/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/Jos2EYh6yG

Finished off Unit 2 and sped ahead on the leaderboard. Did more hiragana as well.

Nice battery level ik :3

10/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/xJnbdLttj7

I had a bone to pick ü§£

11/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/wLRT4hDa1w

No. 2 beat me while I was flying =_=

Did lessons and hiragana practice.

12/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/Bf1Ippzeyv

Finished off Unit 3, and practiced some hiragana. Unlocked all of the first set now!

Difficult to do much on the plane due to no internet xD

13/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/Gb271yE90R

We'd just ordered Korean fried chicken and sat nearby to wait.

After five minutes I figure my weeb brother may be interested, so I proudly show him my gold Duolingo hiragana page.

He immediately flips over his phone. 

He's literally doing the SAME.

14/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/byQwsYG09o

All the goj≈´on hiragana are complete!

4 more sections to go :D

And then there's still katakana and kanji aiyaaa. Learning hiragana will allow me to turn off the romaji/English to force myself to start reading 

15/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/dU9xs1avXu

Dakuon complete.

3 more sections of hiragana!

16/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/NZkO1rln3d

Mostly practiced hiragana. I'll 'finish' before resumIng lessons so I can read *some* Japanese instead of the romaji/latin characters.

My goal is to speed through the katakana next week so I can start kanji early.

17/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/cAa6sej6f1

Did karaoke with the fam and I COULD RECOGNISE CHARACTERS. 

Not enough to read lyrics properly - because there's kanji - but it's exciting! 

Did hiragana practice, too.

18/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/biUoAYOKv5

Travelled today; work + errands after I got home. 

00:49 - Bedtime, finally. Flight was at noon. 

Did hiragana when I could. Looks like Adam is going to be right =_=

„Åä„ÇÑ„Åô„Åø! ‚ù§Ô∏è

19/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/wefrUapIoD

Adam was right. 

A dozen days. üíÄ

Bet I can learn the katakana faster - there are no long stints of travel for a while! :D

20/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/p3ZZbedQ8i https://t.co/JkKg2djCX1

And so it begins. 

Again.

I'll be happy to finish all the hiragana and katakana.

21/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/moNyXnJcG2

I might have COVID for the first time üò¨

Managed a few katakana exercises but not much. The fatigue is *rough*.

22/100 Days of Japanese

I did, like, one katakana exercise.

Oh, well. At least my streak isn't lost.

23/100 Days of Japanese

More Duolingo katakana exercises!

I now have to catch up on 2k XP we had five days to do so my bro and I finish the challenge and I get to top of leaderboard üíÄ In one day.

I guess we know how tomorrow will be going.

24/100 Days of Japanese

HA. Beat the quests and the leaderboard AND finished Unit 4.

That's my brother I carried ü§£

25/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/UenKlmDRLY

COVID can suck it.

If you're on Duolingo, add me!

26/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/8ExwfujCML

Mostly just reviewing stuff I know and some katakana practice.

It's been a long day of just being meh-sick and sleepy.

27/100 Days of Japanese

A small dent, but it's a dent.

Kore wa chi i sai desu üòú

Gonna try to finish the katakana this week so I can start kanji next week. 

28/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/ayPWZROkOG

More small progress.

Iffff I can finish this section tomorrow I might have a shot at finishing all of it by the end of the week :D

29/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/S1uHKxuqs6

Goal for the day achieved.

Shouldn't have napped. It's almost 2 AM and I'm knackered.

30/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/5eA6l4Y4Xu

Long day; didn't get as much memorised as I'd have liked; I'll have to do extra tomorrow, probs.

Downloaded the Anki app and learnt about decks; found one for the kana but I'll have to modify it. Later xD

31/100 Days of Japanese

Nearly done with the katakana. :D

Put in extra effort today.

I waited until they were done fighting for 1st place and then made it unpleasant to try to beat me in a day xD Stacked my XP boosts ü§£

32/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/kDj2CPrEo4

Done - all before noon! 

I'll be winning the league, too ü§£

I've turned off the English letters now. The lessons will be painfully slow until my reading picks up.

33/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/IDUfNvjBnT

Forgot to post!

Set up Anki and a deck with anime phrases. Turns out it's no good for hiragana and katakana - I'm better off writing those out. 

Learnt a cute lil alphabet song too üò≠

34/100 Days of Japanese

Man. Already forgot exactly what I did yesterday.

Just a little bit of practice again - mostly maintaining my score on Duolingo and whatnot. ü§£

36/100 Days of Japanese

I was glancing over things on the shelf and then... 'EHH??? JAPANEEEESE??'

I got so excited when I realised I could read the katakana ü§£

It says kandoru... Candle! 

...Why it says candle in Japanese when everything else is in English idk... üíÄ

37/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/XXbrNtLqJo

Learnt to ask where things are. 

I don't know how to understand the replies so it's not useful yet xD

38/100 Days of Japanese

A few lessons, and a new unit~

My friend was over so I wasn't going to try to do too much, especially with the weekly ranking comp ending tomorrow

39/100 Days of Japanese

The PRESSURE was ON lmaoooooo.

They tried beating me in the last hour thinking I wouldn't be paying attention. I stayed well over 1k points ahead the whole time.

My bestie pretty much just cheered on in amusement üíÄ

40/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/aQYb3j4MPT

One lesson kind of day. Friend left today so I went straight back to attempting to work.

41/100 Days of Japanese

One lesson. Low energy day.

Was a struggle to get anything done tbh.

42/100 Days of Japanese

One lesson again.

Low energy but managed to put a dent in work, so.... Good enough ig.

43/100 Days of Japanese

Sped up to the top of the leaderboard.

They're introducing another colour and more items now. Lessons are getting more difficult.

44/100 Days of Japanese

Learnt more about 'these' and 'those'.

It was a bit confusing at first -

sore re wa watashino

Hearing the 'wa' twice took effort to recognise

45/100 Days of Japanese

I. COULD. READ. THIS.

Still just a single lesson kinda day though xD Slept too late finish off the work project (!!) so effectively had half a day to catch up on errands.

46/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/7YYi9xkHHT

Very upset ü§£ I was dragged out for GROCERIES too late and so lost my score-keeping ability. Next Sunday I'm just refusing to leave the house if I'm not back by 3 PM for freakin' Duolingo ü§£ü§£

Grateful I get to be fake upset over nothing. ^^

47/100 Days of Japanese

Did a wee bit of Duolingo and then did some rhythm practice with poetry and a children's song with one of Kaname Naito's videos.

Kinda fun!

49/100 Days of Japanese https://t.co/Zcs7aIXvVL

I can't believe I've let a month of updates go by without posting, though I definitely can remember when I put writing them off üíÄ Never again.

Incoming slew of updates until they catch up üò©

I've been hooked on Duo ü§£

50/100 Days of Japanese

I'm a Duolingoner üíÄ

51/100 Days of Japanese

Apparently reading from Japanese children's books isn't advisable; what they need to learn as young native speakers vastly differs from us as foreign adult learners.

Watching TV dramas is better, or books specifically designed for adult learning.

52/100 Days of Japanese

Another day, another few Duo lessons~

This is too easy to rely on tbh.

53/100 Days of Japanese

ehehe üíÄ

64/100 Days of Japanese

This feels difficult af but I'm probs not going to bother with the Leagues anymore...

I can clearly do it but like... It's not worth that timesink when I have other shit to do. And Duolingo isn't going to help me with my writing or speaking practice.

65/100 Days of Japanese

One lesson kind of day~

Because cleaning.

in other non-news, I built a spin bike üö≤

Managed a lesson early in the day before heading out to a friend's house party.

The next couple of weeks are gonna be a s t r u g g l e.

73/100 Days of Japanese

Taught two workshops - threejs and GSAP - followed by attending a RAVE so I made time for a couple of lessons in the car xD

Managed to avoid an onset of a headache too, yay.

74/100 Days of Japanese

Feel a bit guilty I didn't do the friend quest in time but it's not like he tried all that hard either. Why am I always carrying üò©

I've been hanging around the same module for a week though, not wanting to boost XP... But it shouldn't matter anymore due to me opting out of the leaderboards. So w/e.

82/100 Days of Japanese

A lot of what I learnt has disappeared.
